title: Minimalist Diamond Bangle Set - "Kundan Kanganam"
materials: G color). Features a fine Hyderabadi polish for a lasting luster and increased durability.
features: These sleek bangles feature a minimalist design, with a row of three diamond-set square motifs spaced evenly along the bangle. The diamonds are bezel-set, providing a clean and modern look while ensuring stone security. The bangles are lightweight and comfortable for everyday wear, offering a contemporary take on traditional Indian jewelry.
colors: Classic gold paired with the icy sparkle of diamonds.
occasions: or as an elegant accessory for festive occasions. Also suitable as a thoughtful gift for a modern woman who appreciates understated luxury.
description: A timeless blend of tradition and contemporary design, these bangles offer exceptional value. The high-quality diamonds provide lasting brilliance, while the 22K gold ensures durability and heirloom quality. The minimalist design allows for versatile styling, complementing both traditional and modern outfits. These Kanganam are a subtle statement of refined taste.
